Title: Episode 6
Plot: An armed robbery leads Gene to Chas Cale, a criminal he tried to bring down in Manchester. But when Chas reveals his alibi, Gene begins to wonder if he is past his prime as a DCI. Alex sends Ray and Chris undercover at the local pub in order to solve the case.
GuestStars: Philip Davis, Sid Mitchell, Asa Butterfield, Anna Wilson-Jones, Madhav Sharma
